How to Install heimdal-kcm on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • heimdal-kcm

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install heimdal-kcm on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing heimdal-kcm on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall heimdal-kcm in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install heimdal-kcm, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install heimdal-kcm Using apt

To install heimdal-kcm in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install heimdal-kcm using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install heimdal-kcm

The installation of heimdal-kcm might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install heimdal-kcm Using apt-get

To install heimdal-kcm using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install heimdal-kcm.

sudo apt-get -y install heimdal-kcm

Install heimdal-kcm Using Synaptic

To install heimdal-kcm using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install heimdal-kcm on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for heimdal-kcm. This will display the heimdal-kcm package in the package window, now to install heimdal-kcm, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the heimdal-kcm package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of heimdal-kcm.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install heimdal-kcm Using aptitude

To install heimdal-kcm on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of heimdal-kcm.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install heimdal-kcm using the command aptitude install heimdal-kcm.

sudo aptitude -y install heimdal-kcm

How to Upgrade heimdal-kcm on debian

If you want to upgrade the heimdal-kcm package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade heimdal-kcm using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade heimdal-kcm to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade heimdal-kcm.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade heimdal-kcm sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade heimdal-kcm

Upgrade heimdal-kcm using Aptitude

To upgrade heimdal-kcm using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade heimdal-kcm.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade heimdal-kcm

Upgrade heimdal-kcm using Synaptic

To upgrade heimdal-kcm using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for heimdal-kcm, now right-click heimdal-kcm, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade heimdal-kcm just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall heimdal-kcm on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall heimdal-kcm from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just heimdal-kcm, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove heimdal-kcm

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of heimdal-kcm

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of heimdal-kcm you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge heimdal-kcm

Remove heimdal-kcm using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall heimdal-kcm using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for heimdal-kcm, right-click the heimdal-kcm package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall heimdal-kcm click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install heimdal-kcm on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade heimdal-kcm using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of heimdal-kcm then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
